items.title: Israel-Palestine: the bereaved parents bringing hope to a divided land
bullets: • Palestinians and Israelis are working to build peace where politics has failed
• They are united in loss: specifically, the loss of a child
• Something else unites them: a determination to build bridges of shared understanding
• The fighting has to end, and bereaved parents are better placed than most to achieve that

• The further the students dig, the more they uncover the terrifying truths of this bunker

items.title: Trump suggests U.S. won't pay any SNAP benefits during shutdown, contradicting court filing
bullets: • President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the United States would not pay any SNAP benefits during the government shutdown
• Trump said that the benefits, which help feed 42 million Americans, will resume only after Democrats in Congress agree to pass a stopgap funding bill that would reopen the government
• The administration on Monday told a federal judge that it would pay half of the costs of the benefits
